oa:header.text: Customer Account Setup Request Log Table

oa:tip.text: Only 1 (one) account can be created for a Party
PO Box Addresses are not eligible for Ship to
TIN Number must be in 00-0000000 format

oa:table.text: Universal Program Codes for this Contract

oa:tip.text: AP Contact phone and email/fax is required for accounts receivable correspondence and collection efforts.
Email Address or Fax Number is Mandatory for AP Contact.
Only one Document can be added to the Request
